trans-unit.source: Provides a dialog box, which prompts for account information of a Windows Service application.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma caixa de diálogo que solicita informações da conta de um aplicativo de serviço do Windows.

trans-unit.source: Normally, you do not use the ServiceInstallerDialog class directly within your code; this dialog is generally used by the installation utility for a Windows Service application.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, você não usar a classe ServiceInstallerDialog diretamente no seu código; Essa caixa de diálogo geralmente é usada pelo utilitário de instalação de um aplicativo de serviço do Windows.

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller> object has the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Account%2A> set to `User`, and either the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Username%2A> or <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Password%2A> is an empty string (""), then the installation utility uses ServiceInstallerDialog to prompt for these values.
trans-unit.target: Se um <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller>objeto tem o <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Account%2A>definido como `User`e o <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Username%2A>ou <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Password%2A>é uma cadeia de caracteres vazia (""), em seguida, o utilitário de instalação usa ServiceInstallerDialog para solicitar esses valores.</xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Password%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Username%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Account%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller>

trans-unit.source: ServiceInstallerDialog derives from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>; use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class methods and properties to display and manipulate the dialog.
trans-unit.target: ServiceInstallerDialog deriva <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>; use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>classe métodos e propriedades para exibir e manipular a caixa de diálogo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: For example, use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A> to display the form, and then check the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Result%2A> before validating the input text for the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>para exibir o formulário e, em seguida, verificar o <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Result%2A>antes de validar o texto de entrada para o <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A>e <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Result%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > ServiceInstallerDialog does not check the credentials and privileges for the specified account.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > ServiceInstallerDialog não verifica as credenciais e privilégios para a conta especificada.

trans-unit.source: For example, the user might enter an invalid account name and password for the computer, or the account might not have the correct privileges to run as a service.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o usuário pode inserir um nome inválido e a senha para o computador ou a conta talvez não tenha os privilégios corretos para ser executado como um serviço.

trans-unit.source: Validate the user input to ensure that the installed service runs successfully.
trans-unit.target: Valide o entrada do usuário para garantir que o serviço instalado seja executado com êxito.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the service account form.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do formulário de conta de serviço.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog> form has its <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Result%2A> set to <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialogResult>, the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A> set to an empty string (""), and the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A> set to an empty string.
trans-unit.target: Um novo <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog>formulário tem seu <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Result%2A>definido como <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialogResult>, o <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A>definido como uma cadeia de caracteres vazia ("") e o <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A>definido como uma cadeia de caracteres vazia.</xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialogResult> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Result%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog>

trans-unit.source: Begins running a standard application message loop and displays the service account form.
trans-unit.target: Inicia a execução de um loop de mensagem de aplicativo padrão e exibe o formulário de conta de serviço.

trans-unit.source: This method is equivalent to calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Run%2A?displayProperty=fullName> on a new <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog> form; it is typically used for testing purposes.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é equivalente a chamar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Run%2A?displayProperty=fullName>em um novo <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog>formulário; ela é normalmente usada para fins de teste.</xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Run%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A> on the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog> form to display the dialog box in your application.
trans-unit.target: Chamar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>no <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog>formulário para exibir a caixa de diálogo em seu aplicativo.</xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the password for the service account form.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a senha para o formulário de conta de serviço.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog> does not validate the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A> and Password values.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog>não valida o <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A>e valores de senha.</xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog>

trans-unit.source: The dialog checks that the user confirms the password, but it does not authenticate the account credentials on the computer.
trans-unit.target: A caixa de diálogo verifica que o usuário confirma a senha, mas não autentica as credenciais da conta do computador.

trans-unit.source: A string representing the password in the service account form.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que representa a senha no formulário de conta de serviço.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: O padrão é uma cadeia de caracteres vazia ("").

trans-unit.source: Gets the dialog result for the service account form.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o resultado da caixa de diálogo para o formulário de conta de serviço.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A> to prompt the user for the service installation account, then check the Result value.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>para solicitar ao usuário para a conta de serviço de instalação, verifique o valor do resultado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the value is <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialogResult>, verify that the input <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A> are valid.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor for <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialogResult>, verifique a entrada <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A>e <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A>são válidos.</xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialogResult>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialogResult"></xref> indicating the user response to the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialogResult"> </xref> indicando que a resposta do usuário à caixa de diálogo.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_OK" name="OK" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_OK" name="OK" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user name for the service account form.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome de usuário para o formulário de conta de serviço.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog> does not validate the Username or <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A> values.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog>não valida o nome de usuário ou <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A>valores.</xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog>

trans-unit.source: A string representing the user name in the service account form.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que representa o nome de usuário no formulário de conta de serviço.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: O padrão é uma cadeia de caracteres vazia ("").
